content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s mulberry merino 1 80% merino wool 20% mulberry silk each skein is 247 yards/ 100 grams approximately 247 yards required this is the color paprika red - us 6 4 mm 20 24 or 32-inch circular needles 3 - a stitch marker 4 gauge 18 stitches and 36 row 18 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch size - finished length of wingspan 35½ inches - finished length of each short side 22 inches - finished length from cast-on point to middle of bind-off edge 14 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/mulberry-merino 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
